item.title: The Future of Corporate Governance Part I: The Problem of Twelve
item.description: The Problem of Twelve: In the near future, roughly 12 individuals will have practical power over majority of US public companies. A Short History of Corporations In the first stage, entrepreneurs get money from savings, “friends, family, and fools”, and VCs. Securities law restricts this to sophisticated investors only.
